medium: Engravings, color lithograph, reproductions of oil paintings
title: The Captive Mind
description: 2 engravings of pen and ink drawings, 1 color lithograph (frontispiece), 9 reproductions of oil paintings; binding: natural linen stamped in black leaf; endpapers: charcoal grey landmarked Tweedweave; slip case: charcoal grey paper over cardboard, lettering stamped in black; type: Monotype Veronese; 190 pp.
